# <code>to toml</code> for formats

<div class='command-title'>Convert table into .toml text</div>

## Signature

```> to toml```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Outputs an TOML string representing the contents of this table
```shell
  > [[foo bar]; ["1" "2"]] | to toml
```
